statements: DELETE FROM user_behavior WHERE typing_speed > 50 AND mouse_movements < 100;
DELETE FROM user_behavior WHERE user_id = 100 AND typing_speed > 50;
DELETE FROM user_behavior WHERE mouse_movements < 100 OR typing_speed < 30;
DELETE FROM mouse_activities WHERE user_id = 3 AND activity_type = 'click';
DELETE FROM mouse_activities WHERE user_id = 202 AND activity_type = 'click' AND timestamp < '2022-01-01';
DELETE FROM mouse_movements WHERE distance > 1000 AND duration < 60;
DELETE FROM typing_speed WHERE user_id = 201 AND speed < 50;
